Aguar_1: Lenny informed me we are required to wear outfits. I suppose this is passable.
Aguar_1-2heart: If only our formal wizardry attire were more like this. Personally I find this much more fun than that gothic cowboy look.#$b#Perhaps I’ll surprise Rasmodius by wearing this to our next meeting...$1
Aguar_2: My outfit? Oh, this is just something I found laying around... Don’t think too much of it, @.
Aguar_2-2heart: Have you ever heard the saying, "It's darkest underneath the lamp", @?#$b#It means that sometimes the best place to hide something is in plain sight.$1
Wizard_2: Aguatros certainly is bold, wearing his formal robes so publicly... But I suppose this is the best night to do it.
Alissa_1: All the other girls look so cute, and I look so frumpy...$s#$b#Maybe I could ask Faye for costume advice next year?
Alissa_2: Well, when I heard you and Dad were going as pirates, I thought I’d surprise you both by joining in the theme! Don’t we all look cute together?$1
Alissa_spouse_1: Do you think this looks cute on me, @?$2#$b#No, I mean... I know I look cute, right?#$b#I'm trying to have a bit more confidence in myself.$1
Alissa_spouse_2: Oh, hi sweetie! Don’t mind me - You go enjoy the festival and I’ll stay here.$1#$b#Not that I don’t want to spend time with you! It’s just, well, this costume is awfully hard to walk in...$s
Anton_1: Kiarra keeps threatening to "et tu" me. I'm not sure if she's mad at me or not...
Anton_2: Wait, what’s that big black thing in the cor– Oh, it’s my finger...$u#$b#...Uhh, guys? Mind if we take another one?$1
Anton_spouse_1: You don't mind if I coordinate with Paula, do you? She was nervous to go by herself.#$b#Though if you have any ideas for couple's costumes, I'm all ears...$4
Anton_spouse_2: Marrying you, I sure feel like I went from zero to hero.$4#$b#So, want a picture?$1
Anton_2-ian: Oops, looks like Ian and I had the same idea. Wish I’d known, ‘cause he definitely pulls it off better than me...$u
Ariah_1: Irene, once you’re done refilling the buffet, can we please go in the maze together? You promised we would...$s
Ariah_2: I wish Grandmother would wrap up her conversation so I can go home and study. Look at me, reduced to reading by a stack of hay! Hmph.$a
Bert_1: Don't you worry none, sweetie, I'll help you clean up afterwards.#$b#This way, I can say the part about how you're already the most beautiful of them all as many times as I want!$h
Bert_2: Mwahaha! You'd better run, princess, or I'll drag you back to my evil lair!$h
Blair_1: Mom!! Why are you dressed up as some kiddie character!?$a#$b#Ugh... Don’t stand next to me, it’s too embarrassing!$a
Blair_2: Prepare for trouble, for Team Prankster has arrived!$h
Blair_spouse_1: Mom, @ is coming! Don't make me regret coming with you...$a#$e#Oh, hey babe! Are you enjoying the festival?#$b#Don’t get too close, or my hair might bite you!$1
Blair_spouse_2: Hey, babe! You should put on some cat ears and join us!$h
Bryle_1-single: I already told you, Faye, I didn’t know about your costume when I chose mine.$a#$b#Believe it or not, most people don't plan their lives around you, Miss Center of the Universe.$a
Bryle_1-faye: Be careful not to eat too many sweets, Faye... I’m not gonna carry you back up the mountain if you get a sugar crash...$6#$b#I mean, I will, of course, but I don’t want to...$s
Bryle_2: Lewis tasked me with surveilling the perimeter all night to ensure everyone’s safety, so feel free to enjoy the festival with peace of mind.
Bryle_spouse_1: I suppose I could wear something that doesn't clash with Faye, but I look damn good in this, don't you think?#$b#Plus, I can't help giving her a hard time every now and then.$1
Bryle_spouse_2: What, this gun? Oh, of course it’s not real! I would never walk around brandishing a real gun in people’s faces.#$b#Don’t worry, babe. My actual firearm is safely concealed in the holster under my jacket.$h
Carmen_1: Oh, lighten up, chica! I’m dressed like a monster, just like you!$h#$b#Would you feel better if I gave you a cookie? Eh? Ehhh?$h
Carmen_2: I found this kitty outfit at the store! Aren't I a cute little kitty?$h
Corine_1: Don't be silly, Ysa, of course I'd do it for you!$1
Corine_2: What do you think, @? If I can pull this one off, maybe I should consider a career change.$1
Corine_2-8heart: Jio said I couldn't wear my training robes as a costume... Hmph.$5#$b#I guess I'll just be a pretend undercover fighter instead!$h
Corine_spouse_1: Coordinating outfits is fun, don't you think, @?$1#$b#Maybe we could try it sometime...?$4
Corine_spouse_2: Better be careful, tonight, @. I've got a lot of concealed knives.$1
Daia_1: Has that wet blanket Jio been bothering you about me?$8#$b#Well, you can tell him he has nothing to worry about! I’m perfectly capable of behaving myself - Besides, I’m completely covered, head to toe!$6
Daia_2: Now this delectable snack here knows how to liven up a party. Those abs are a feast for the eyes.$6#$b#Do you know if he's seeing anyone, @?$7
Daia_spouse_1: Which do you prefer, @? Leaving something to the imagination, or baring it all?$6
Daia_spouse_2: Once I'm off duty, shall we have a little trick-or-treat of our own?$7#$b#Of course, it'll be a treat for you, baby.$l
Ezekiel_1: Look at my daughter, taking photos with her friends! It reminds me of when she was a little girl...$4#$b#Now she’s all grown up, and I couldn’t be prouder... *sniff*$4
Ezekiel_2: ...If that Jeric so much as looks at my Corine, I’m throwing him in that cage with the skeletons.$a
Faye_1-bryle: Bryle, darling, look at all this food! It all looks so good, I don’t even know where to start!$h#$b#Hmm, which should I have first? The bat cupcakes? The pumpkin cookies? The ghost macaroons? Ahh, I can’t decide!$h
Faye_1-single: Oh, that Bryle! He saw me dressed up as this famous character and just thought he had to match!$a#$b#And his outfit's not even the right color palette!$5
Faye_1-nobryle: If only I'd remembered Spirit's Eve was coming earlier, I could have planned something more elaborate...$s#$b#But sometimes classics are fun, too.$h
Faye_2: This is my favorite festival, beyond a sliver of a doubt!$1#$b#So what do you think, @? I've been working on it for weeks!
Faye_spouse_1: I know I wore this one a couple of years ago, but it seems like a waste to only wear it once, you know?$h#$b#Plus I don't even need a wig!$h
Faye_spouse_2: Sweetie, I don't suppose you could bring me some snacks, can you? It's a little hard to move around in this outfit.
Flor_1: @! I– um– behind me– J-Jeric– s-so...incredibly...shirtless...$3#$b#I-I don’t– Um, what do I– Where am I...s-supposed...t-t-to look...??$3
Flor_2: Trinnie said I should dress up like a teacher.#$b#I-I'm not really sure this looks very teacher-esque, though...$2
Flor_spouse_1: Would you stay with me a moment, @? I need to calm my nerves after seeing Jeric...$2#$b#I mean, there's only one person I want to see without a shirt on...$4
Flor_spouse_2: The kids really wanted me to dress up like a teacher again.#$b#Though, um, if there was something you liked more, I could consider it?$4
Freddie_1: Oh, phooey, Lola. You grow more beautiful each and every day, right before my eyes.$1
Freddie_2: @, do you ever think about how odd it is that Death's weapon of choice is just a simple farming tool?$1#$b#Well, perhaps it just goes to show that sometimes that which seems plain and ordinary can actually be the greatest danger.
Freddie_2-8heart: "The Grim Reaper" was my nickname for a time - although I always found it a bit uninspired.#$b#Not that I'd expect great wit from the morons who dared to make an enemy of me, of course! Ha!$1
Ian_1: Sean came up with our outfits. What do you think?#$b#Mine was really cheap.$h
Ian_2: Kenneth? Hello?#$b#...Uh, Kenneth? You in there, buddy?$3
Ian_spouse_1: It's okay if I wear this outfit over again, right, honey? I didn't want to disappoint Sean.$1
Ian_spouse_2: How do you feel about stubble, @?#$b#I could... maybe let it grow out once in a while.$l
Irene_1: One second, Ariah! Let me just change out these potatoes...$1#$b#Wait a– Has the fruit salad run out, too? Shoot...!$u
Irene_2-nozayne: I love this costume, but... do you think I pull it off well?$s#$b#Ahh, I feel so silly...$3#$e#...@, do you ever think about dying?$1#$b#...$1#$b#...I don't know why I just said that.$s
Irene_2-single: I wasn't planning on coordinating with anyone, but doesn't that costume just suit Zayne perfectly?#$b#He makes the perfect accessory to my look - But don't tell him I said that!$1
Irene_2-zayne: O-M-Y Zayne, I just can't get over how hot you look like this! I just want to eat you up!$l#$b#Hey, @! We're next in line for pictures, and Zayne promised to hold me on his shoulder for one!#$b#I'm so excited, I just might pass out! Eeeee~!$1
Irene_spouse_1: I offered to help Pika out this year, but this costume isn't really meant for all this hustle and bustle...$s#$b#Well, if I lose a lollipop, you can just stick it back in my wig. 'Kay, honey?$1
Irene_spouse_2: Honey, I just want you to know that...$3#$b#Thanks to you, today is the best day ever. So was yesterday, and so is tomorrow, and every day from now until forever.$l#$e#And I'm so happy to be your bride-wife instead of your long-term long-distance low-commitment casual girlfriend.$1
Jeric_1: Hey there, @. I’m trying to score tonight, and I’d love to touchdown in your end zone.$6#$b#Chill, chill! I’m just playin’. Pretty good line though, right?$1
Jeric_2: Chill out, Maddie, I’m not hurting anyone. If anything, I’m giving them all a treat on this fine Spirit’s Eve.$8#$b#So quit harshing the vibes! Anyway, check out my tail! Sexy, right?$7
Jeric_spouse_1: Hey babe! What do you think?$7#$b# I know, I know... Hands down the sexiest - and it’s all yours.$6
Jeric_spouse_2: You go have fun, @, I'm just going to annoy Maddie a little bit more.$1#$b#Don’t worry, you’ll have this sexy devil all to yourself once we get home.$7
Jio_1: @, can you alert me if Daia does anything rash? I’m doing my best to keep an eye on her without revealing myself, but there is only so much I can do from the shadows...#$b#Only one thing is certain - No good can come of Daia interacting with the locals while dressed like- like that...$7
Jio_2: Hm... Due to the nature of this evening, I can attend this event publicly without donning any sort of disguise, and even the locals who do not know me think nothing of it...$7#$b#What a peculiar festival this is.$h
Jio_spouse_1: I found this costume in the discount section of the general store... Tell me, my love, is this really what the average human thinks elves look like?#$e#It took me a while to grow accustomed to these tights, but I must concede that they are rather comfortable.$h
Jio_spouse_2: Hey, listen!#$b#Hm... Nevermind. I thought I heard something for a moment... Must've been the wind.
Jio_spouse_2-corine: Corine brought me this costume and insisted that I wear it to this festival. She did not elaborate further...#$b#Oh, and she told me to say, "Hyup!"
June_1: I find it so interesting to see everyone in their costumes. It tells you a lot about a person, y’know?$1#$b#Take those two over there. I had no idea Flor had a nerdy side, or that Jeric was in such good shape.#$b#I mean, it does make sense, given his line of work and all, but, wow, that’s one hell of a six-pack.$3#$b#Seriously, you could sharpen a knife on those abs - Not to mention his biceps...$3#$b#...Sorry, what were we talking about?
June_2: Be careful not to touch me, @. I don’t want to stain any of your clothes gray.#$b#You wouldn’t believe how much of this stuff I have on me. I swear, I had to go through three whole tins just to cover my tat–$s#$b#I, um... Hm... Enjoy the rest of your evening, @.$3
June_spouse_1: Ugh, this wig is so itchy... Maybe I should’ve just dyed my hair back to its natural color.$s#$b#But black hair makes me look dark academia when the aesthetic I’m trying to achieve is modern minimalism! And that's like apples and oranges in terms of ideology... Hmph.$s
June_spouse_2: Hey, hon. It’s getting awfully late, isn’t it?$1#$b#What do you say we go home and I see how much of this body paint I can get on you?$9
Keahi_1: Don't be too sus, @, or I'll vote you off the ship!$4
Keahi_2: Yarr! I'm the king of the pirates, @!$1
Kenneth_spouse_1: ...#$b#Psst, @ - Do you think you could slip me some cupcakes though the exhaust hatch? They smell great.
Kiarra_1: Like my outfit, @?#$b#It might not be the most riveting– Actually, it IS the most riveting!$1
Kiarra_2: I worked up the nerve to go as one of my favorite characters.$1#$b#I had such a crush on her when I was younger...$4
Kiarra_spouse_1: Hey, @... if you're wondering if we can do it, yes we can.$h
Kiarra_spouse_2: Wanna pose for a picture with me, @?#$b#It's simple - Let me just hold you in my arms and lean you over, and put my hand on your chest...$4

Kimpoi_2: I think I’ll just let those two sort that out themselves...#$b#Anyway, happy Spirit’s Eve, @.$h
Kiwi_1: Kiwi in disguise as pumpkin. Kiwi blend in well!$h
Kiwi_2: Daia say this kiwi real look.#$b#Kiwi disagree.$5
Lenny_1: Hello, @! If you need me, I'll be plotting nefarious deeds in my underground lair.$1
Lenny_2: What do you think of my outfit, @? It's shrimply amazing, right?$1#$b#I need to share that one with Sean, he'll appreciate it.
Lola_1: It's been a long time since I last wore a wig... Still, it's nice to make-believe I'm not old and gray from time to time.$1
Lola_2: Surprised to see us in such spooky costumes? Freddie and I used put quite the fright in folks on Spirit's Eve, you know.$1
Lola_2-8heart: I actually got this headpiece from one of our missions way back when.#$b#The locals called it the crown of thorns, and it was said that its points were so sharp it could pierce straight through flesh.#$b#Personally, I found my dagger to be much more effective.$1
Lorenzo_1: Oh, come on, dear - You could make a burlap sack look like a runway piece! Please let me get just one picture with the world's most beautiful woman by my side.$1
Lorenzo_2: Of course, mi amor! Anything for my dear wife!$1

Louie_2: What an odd choice of pet. It can’t go on walks, it can’t do any tricks - Not to mention the smell...$3#$b#But I suppose it’s somewhat cute, in an odd, ugly way...#$e#AAAHH! Yuuma, this scaly mongrel of yours just bit me!$a
Maddie_1: Well, it's not like I really had an outfit lined up already, so I guess it's fine.#$b#These photos... they're not going to be posted anywhere, are they?$4
Maddie_2: Jeric!! What in the world is wrong with you?!? There are literal children around – Either cover all of THAT up or go home right now!!!$a

Maddie_spouse_2: Hmph, I'm just going to ignore Jeric’s showboating this year.#$b#I only have eyes for one person, after all.$4

Maive_2: There's also something to be said for costumes that are easily recognizable, Sonny.#$b#Though I suppose it's to be expected that not everyone here is familiar with the classics.
Malaya_1: We used to watch this show with Lissa all the time when she was young.$1#$b#Oh... maybe she considers herself too old for it now?$2
Malaya_2: Why, Lissa, dear! Don’t you look stunning!$7#$b#...Just out of curiosity, what compelled you to choose this particular costume? It just, um... suits you so well!$h
Naomi_1: I always liked it as a kid when my parents would dress up with me. I'm glad I could do the same for Yuuma this year.
Naomi_2: It's such a blessing to see both of my sons so happy...$1#$b#I wish Shoto were here to see it, as well...$s#$b#But in the meantime, I'll be sure to tell him all about it when we call next.
Olga_1: I'm not sure about all this green, Bert. We're going to have a heck of a time getting it off.
Olga_2: Naomi mentioned dressing up to match her kids, so I thought we could try it.#$b#I'm glad we did. Bert and Trinnie are having so much fun posing together.$1
Paula_1: This outfit makes me feel so pretty.$4#$b#Still, it’s hard not to feel self-conscious...$s#$b#But it’s a bit better with Anton pairing up with me.$1

Paula_2-anton: Anton offered to fill in for Kiarra so that she could have a chance to enjoy the festival! Isn’t that so sweet?$h#$b#He can be such a softie, underneath that rough-for-wear outer shell of his.$l
Paula_spouse_1: I wanted to wear this so you'd be with the prettiest girl here.$1#$b#How long I keep it on after we get home depends on you.$4
Paula_spouse_2: I love this outfit, honestly. Sometimes you just need to channel your inner sass.$1

Philip_2: Strike first! Strike hard! No mercy!!$a#$b#Shiro? What's wrong!? You didn't over-exert yourself, did you? Should we take a break?$s#$b#I knew this was a bad idea... What kind of physical therapist karate-fights their patient?$s

Philip_spouse_2: I've never actually done karate, but the clothes make me feel pretty cool!#$b#Maybe I should rock the sleeveless look more often.$1
Pika_1: Pretty good spread, huh? What can I say except "you're welcome"?$1
Pika_2: I don't really know much about this show, but Keahi likes it a lot.#$b#What do you think, @? Am I pulling it off?$1
Richard_1: You came, @! I award you 15 points for attendance!$1#$b#Not that I ever doubted you, of course. Now go enjoy the festival!
Richard_2: @, should you dine on this wine, you'll be in a world of pure intoxication...$h#$b#Oh, and be sure to try the blueberry pie - It’s to die for!$h
Sean_1: No, I'm not an elk, @. It's a reindeer. Don't rein on my parade, or I'll...#$b#Sorry, I got nothing that puns with "elk".$2
Sean_2: And make it double - It's the day to be terrorized!$h
Sean_spouse_1: So, @, how do you feel about furries? Because this is pretty comfortable, actually.$h
Sean_spouse_2: Would you prefer to prepare for trouble now in the maze, or back home?$l
Shanice_1: A picture? I don't know, Lorenzo - This costume isn't exactly flattering...$s
Shanice_2: Lorenzo, darling! Shall we go put a little spook into the children tonight, mon cher?$1

Shiro_2: Kiai! Kiai! Kiai! Ki-$a#$b#Agh– Oof... I...$s#$b#...I'm alright, Philip. Don't worry... Let's go again.#$b#Just don't sweep the leg, okay? Alright... Banzai!!$1
Shiro_spouse_1: I'll be honest with you, @ - This costume does make me feel pretty super.$1
Shiro_spouse_2: Hey, honey. Do you like my outfit? The hachimaki's part of the costume, of course, but these are my real judo gi from back in the day. Even the black belt is real!$1#$b#Let's just say that Philip's lucky I'm going easy on him.$1
Sonny_1: All aboard! Glad to see you joined the festivities, Mr. @.$h^All aboard! Glad to see you joined the festivities, Ms. @.$h#$b#Sadly, Young Mr. Amethyne doesn't look very pleased with his costume this year...$3
Sonny_2: Oh, good evening, Mr. @!$h^Oh, good evening, Ms. @!$h#$b#It’s elementary we discuss the importance of an appropriate costume during this event. Isn’t that right, Madame Maive?$h

Trinnie_2: Yeek, I'm gonna get kidnapped!!$1#$b#Hey - D’you think if I ask Keahi, he’ll be my hero for the night and save me...?$4

Ysabelle_2: O-M-Y Faye, your costume is absolutely divine! Did you really stitch those petals yourself?$h#$e#Oh, hello @! Do you recognize my costume, or are you not cultured enough, hm?$1
Ysabelle_spouse_1: @, if you want to join us next year, you could always be our villain.$1
Ysabelle_spouse_2: I'm impressed I could fit into this old performance tutu still.$1#$b#Now no tricks from you, @. If you're good, I'll show you how to do a pas de deux.$4
Yuuma_1: It’s morphin’ time!!!#$b#Hm... it doesn’t sound very cool when I say it...
Yuuma_2: He’s not a pet, Louie, he’s my friend. And he’s the coolest guy I know.$h#$b#See this shell around him? That’s not a shell, it’s his exoskeleton. That means his bones are outside of his body rather than inside it, like ours are.#$b#And he can retract his limbs and hide inside it in case he feels threatened. So he’s basically a pro at hide-and-seek.#$b#Plus, he looks really spiffy in his hat, don’t you think?$h
Zayne_1: A toast to an auspicious festival, @!#$b#Drink up, if you like. I'm certainly not letting anyone get behind the wheel tonight.$1
Zayne_2-single: When Irene told me about her costume plans, I couldn't resist pairing up with her.#$b#I pull off blonde pretty well, don’t you think?$1
Zayne_2-irene: Grandmother’s not pleased with me for dressing in such an "immodest" fashion...#$b#But when it’s for my darling Irene’s sake, how on earth could I say no?$l#$e#...Irene, dear? How much longer do I have to carry around this surfboard?$s
Zayne_spouse_1: It always feels different when you wear a suit to a costume party like this. That said, I don't mind it in the slightest.$1#$b#Can you think of other places I should wear it?$4
Zayne_spouse_2: Grandmother's not pleased with me for dressing in such an "immodest" fashion...#$b#But I wanted to make sure you had a chance to see this look up close.$4#$e#So what do you think? Am I a ten?#$b#Maybe when we get home later I can play the guitar at you.$1
